article.Heading: Have raised issues faced by auto sector with govt officials with respect to GST: FADA
article.Summary: In an interview to CNBC-TV18's Ronojoy Banerjee, John Paul President, FADA spoke about the goods and services tax (GST) and its impacts on their business and Indian economy.
article.Body:
In an interview to CNBC-TV18's Ronojoy Banerjee, John Paul President, FADA spoke about the goods and services tax (GST) and its impacts on their business and Indian economy.
